articles.description: The Alabama Department of Public Health is working on improving vaccine access among vulnerable populations.
articles.content: The states effort to improve access to the COVID-19 vaccine and build trust in the vaccine for one of Alabamas most vulnerable groups Black residents is lacking for a population nearly three times mo… [+5474 chars]

articles.title: Man in 70s dies after getting vaccine at Javits Center; not believed to be allergic reaction: officials - WPIX 11 New York

articles.content:
HUDSON YARDS, Manhattan Health officials confirmed early Monday that a man died shortly after getting the COVID-19 vaccine Sunday morning at the Jacob Javits Convention Center in Manhattan.
